overview: Ashley Pearson is an advertising photographer based in the United Kingdom. He specializes in still life, product photography, ranging from cosmetic products to clothing. His style is contemporary, clean and graphical, using his knowledge to get the right angle, lighting and composition to get the right message the subject is trying to project. His depth of knowledge and experience in photography ranging from location shoots to studio shoots, this combined with his creative mind and style ensures that what ever kind of image you want he can achieve.
